sentence.text: E168d2 mice carry a frameshift mutation in the CRX activation domain, Glu168del2, which is associated with severe dominant CoRD or LCA in humans.

As seen in human patients, heterozygous E168d2 (AAAAAAE168d2/+AAAAAA) but not R90W (AAAAAAR90W/+AAAAAA) mice show severely impaired retinal function, while mice homozygous for either mutation are blind and undergo rapid photoreceptor degeneration.
